original_title: Cat in the Hat: Tales About Tails
overview: Whatâ€™s better than a tale or two? Tales about Tails from you know who! It so happens the Cat knows a lot about tails There are tails on beavers, and even on whales! You can see how a monkey's tail helps him climb high or a rattlesnake's tail warns of danger nearby. When the kids want to perform a little dance, they meet a bird named Tango, who teaches a prance. Take a journey with your favorite Cat, The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That!
tagline: What's better than a tale or two? Tales about Tails from you know who!
title: Cat in the Hat: Tales About Tails
